summary: Utamaro, a great artist, lives to create portraits of beautiful women, and the brothels of Tokyo provide his models. A world of passion swirls around him, as the women in his life vie for ... See full summary »
cast: Minosuke Bandô|Kinuyo Tanaka|Kôtarô Bandô|Hiroko Kawasaki|Toshiko Iizuka|Kyôko Kusajima|Eiko Ôhara|Shôtarô Nakamura|Kiniko Shiratao|Minpei Tomimoto
title: Utamaro y sus cinco mujeres
